casebody.data:
Dawn M. SIMONS, Personal Representative of the Estate of Lee F. Hartin, Jr., Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Gallagher Bassett Services, Inc., Intervening-Plaintiff,
v.
VISTA GRANDE VILLA, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157109
COA: 337216 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 14, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
